unnormalised: Arrey bhai, India ani Pak-ache cricket match 27/08/2024-ak asa! Tem mhannllear, khub pira'yeche antar! Hanv tednam 5 vorshamni vhodd zatolo. Asha asa te 15/08-ak (Svotontr Dinachea zhogdde, lol!) mukhar dhaddona vo 2025-ak pattlean dhaddona! Mhoji chai thondd zateli fakt ravonkuch. #CricketFever #IndVsPak #WaitingGame
normalised: Arrey bhai, India ani Pak-acho cricket match sattavis August don hazar chovisiek asa! Tem mhanllear, khub poid asa! Hanv tedna panch vorshamni vhodd zatolom. Ashaa asa te pandhra Augustak fuddem dhakolnanchi (Swatantratai disa zalmelo jhagdo, khilkhilat!) va don hazar panchiek dhakolnanchi nhoi! Mhaji chai thondd zateli vatt ravtonch. hash Cricket Fever hash Ind Versus Pak hash Waiting Game
